name: Dance Dance Revolution: Best Hits
description:
Dance Dance Revolution: Best Hits is a little song compilation dancing game of the first Dance Dance Revolution game, Dance Dance Revolution: 2nd Mix and Dance Dance Revolution: 3rd Mix from Konami.

The gameplay consists in stepping in the arrows at the right timing along the music to score points with play modes such as game mode with three sub modes as beginner (to play easy steps with a demonstration), normal (normal gameplay that consists to reach the next stage by dancing good) and nonstop (play courses of 4 songs to clear the stage and enter your high score at the best ranking); the diet mode to reach your calorie burning goal or play time goal with three modes such as standard (select songs by stage), program 1 (play slow songs consecutively) and program 2 (play all songs consecutively); the lesson mode to learn the dancing skills; the training mode to practice tricky steps and the edit mode to edit your steps and store them in a memory card.
